name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, pancetta, eggs, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Neapolitan pizza made with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

name: Lasagna
description: A classic Italian dish made with layers of lasagna noodles, Bolognese sauce, and cheese.

name: Tiramisu
description: A popular Italian dessert made with ladyfingers, espresso, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.

name: Risotto
description: A creamy Italian rice dish made with Arborio rice, chicken broth, Parmesan cheese, and various ingredients like mushrooms, seafood, or vegetables.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: A popular Italian-American dish made with breaded chicken cutlets, tomato sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Gnocchi
description: A type of Italian pasta made with potatoes, flour, and eggs, served with various sauces like tomato sauce, pesto, or cream sauce.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: A pasta dish made with fettuccine noodles, butter, Parmesan cheese, and heavy cream, often served with chicken or shrimp.
